media:group.media:title: Goodbye Overwatch
media:group.media:description:
I guess they finally did "Nerf this". They nerfed Overwatch completely. A farewell to a game that I used to know until greed completely destroyed it.
Support me on Patreon - https://www.patreon.com/powerpak Follow me on Twitter - https://twitter.com/JackWNicholls
Big thank you to Andrew Huntly for contributing and helping edit the script. In lieu of social media plugs, he asks you all to donate to Mermaids UK https://mermaidsuk.org.uk/donate/

entry.title: Channel Update: Testing Positive & Iron Lung!

media:group.media:title: Channel Update: Testing Positive & Iron Lung!
media:group.media:description:
I realise the title implies I am in an Iron Lung. I am not. I'm sick but not THAT sick.
Just a quick hello to everyone and letting people know what I'm doing, as well as how I'm doing (Not Great™). Lots of new people so I also thought I should introduce myself.
Support me on Patreon - https://www.patreon.com/powerpak Follow me on Twitter: https://twitter.com/JackWNicholls
